entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero except 9 over western sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero except 9 over western sections. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
